Name: Flag Collection
About the game: All countries in the world, various organizations, civilizations annihilated in history, etc. Thousands of flags are included! View the details of the flags freely Most of the flags use vector graphics, which can support unlimited resolution! Save to any resolution you want! Unlock more than 90 flag patterns as your achievements! (More flag achievements will be added in the future!)
